name: XMind Template
summary: Learn about .XMT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The XMT file is similar to the .XMIND file but is designed solely for replication of a layout. You can create an XMT file by selecting File â†’ Save Template As....

description: An XMT file is a template used by XMind, a brainstorming and mind mapping application. It contains a diagram, such as a map, organizational chart, logic chart, timeline, or matrix, with user-defined settings. The file allows users to save a layout of a diagram and replicate it.
